name: Optimus Prime
detailsDescription: Optimus Prime is the wise and powerful leader of the Autobots, sworn to protect the innocent and fight against the evil Decepticons.

name: Bumblebee RC Car
detailsDescription: Remote control Bumblebee car with realistic Transformers design, perfect for racing and performing stunts.

name: Transformers Construct-Bots
detailsDescription: Build and customize your own Transformers robots with the Construct-Bots building sets.

name: Transformers Optimus Prime Helmet
detailsDescription: Wearable Optimus Prime helmet with voice-changing effects for immersive Transformers roleplay adventures.

name: Decepticon Attack Playset
detailsDescription: Engage in epic battles between Autobots and Decepticons with the Decepticon Attack Playset.

name: Iron Man Action Figure
detailsDescription: Wearable Spider-Man web shooter that shoots foam web projectiles for exciting roleplay adventures.

name: Captain America Shield
detailsDescription: Officially licensed Captain America shield replica with adjustable straps for cosplay and display.

name: Hulk Smash Hands
detailsDescription: Soft foam Hulk hands that allow you to unleash your inner Hulk and engage in smashing action.

name: Spider-Man Web Shooter
detailsDescription: Wearable Spider-Man web shooter that shoots foam web projectiles for exciting roleplay adventures.

name: Black Widow Costume
detailsDescription: Black Widow costume inspired by the Marvel movies, includes jumpsuit, belt, and wrist gauntlets.

name: Lightsaber Replica
detailsDescription: Realistic lightsaber replica with sound and light effects, perfect for Star Wars enthusiasts and collectors.

name: Millennium Falcon LEGO Set
detailsDescription: Build the iconic Millennium Falcon with this LEGO set, featuring detailed interior and mini-figures of Star Wars characters.

name: Darth Vader Helmet
detailsDescription: Authentic Darth Vader helmet replica with adjustable straps, perfect for cosplay and display.

name: Star Wars X-Wing Drone
detailsDescription: Remote control X-Wing drone with Star Wars design, capable of aerial maneuvers and battles.

name: BB-8 Plush Toy
detailsDescription: Soft and cuddly BB-8 plush toy, a beloved droid character from the Star Wars franchise.
